title: Matchmaking in normals
body: For some reason, in my normal games I play constantly against platinum people. The last three games I've played have featured a Gold 1 or higher player on the other team. I know I don't play well enough to have that high an elo, so why does it keep happening? It's not fun to play a game against a team who is carried hard by someone much better than the other players.

replies.body: One of my rl friends transferred here and in his first game was paired against 3 challengers and 2 diamonds while his team was unranked and silver, lol.

Normal MMR and ranked MMR are completely different. High elo people usually dedicate their lives to ranked and therefore have a low normal MMR and a constantly matched with lower level people. There is also the issue of low player base on OCE server so random matchmaking and so on and so forth.

People have posted the exact same thread like a billion times already.
